about_the_game: Under Contract's original soundtrack is a 21-track Jazzy, Lo-fi, Drum&Bass mixture! The Paper Jams is handcrafted, and an experience easing your overworked souls. A chill yet surprising sadistic composition by composer enbytch.
detailed_description: Under Contract's original soundtrack is a 21-track Jazzy, Lo-fi, Drum&Bass mixture! The Paper Jams is handcrafted, and an experience easing your overworked souls. A chill yet surprising sadistic composition by composer enbytch.
